title: Looking at animals: animals with one foot
creator_credit: Boulton-Hawker Films, Educational Foundation for Visual Aids and Peter Boulton
brief_description: The appearance and characteristics of slugs and snails (gastropods) are shown. The muscular action of a common land snail in movement illustrates the meaning of the word “gastropod” (stomach-foot). Both terrestrial and aquatic snails and slugs are studied.
title_for_label: Looking at animals: animals with one foot
creator_credit_for_label: Boulton-Hawker Films, Educational Foundation for Visual Aids and Peter Boulton
description: The appearance and characteristics of slugs and snails (gastropods) are shown. The muscular action of a common land snail in movement illustrates the meaning of the word “gastropod” (stomach-foot). Both terrestrial and aquatic snails and slugs are studied.
